title: 連結リストの操作1
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

<color=#c586c0>typedef</color> <color=#358cd6>struct</color> data DATA;
<color=#358cd6>struct</color> data<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> number;
  <color=#358cd6>float</color> point;
  DATA* next;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>;

<color=#358cd6>void</color> Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA* head<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  DATA *p;
  <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ff0000>???</color>; p != <color=#358cd6>NULL</color>; p = p->next<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"Num:%d	Point:%f
"</color>, p->number, p->point<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  fflush<color=#ffd700>(</color>stdout<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  DATA d1 = <color=#ffd700>{</color>
    1,10,<color=#358cd6>NULL</color>
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>,d2 = <color=#ffd700>{</color>
    2,20,&d1
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>,d3 = <color=#ffd700>{</color>
    3,30,&d2
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>;
  Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>&d3<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
output:
Num:3   Point:30.000000
Num:2   Point:20.000000
Num:1   Point:10.000000
